target.description: The Hub message this spoke message maps to (e.g., "Record", "Contributor")

preserve_unmapped.description: Whether to preserve unmapped fields in Extra

computed_fields.description: Computed fields that derive values from multiple source fields. These are evaluated after all individual field mappings are processed.

xml_name.title: ===== XML serialization options =====
xml_name.description: ===== XML serialization options =====  XML element name for this message type

xml_namespaces.description: XML namespaces to declare on this element Format: "prefix=uri" (e.g., "dc=http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/")

MessageOptions.title: Message Options
MessageOptions.description: MessageOptions defines message-level Hub mapping options.

computer.description: Name of the registered computation function The function must be registered with ComputedFieldRegistry

date_type.title: ===== Type-specific options (same as FieldOptions) =====
date_type.description: ===== Type-specific options (same as FieldOptions) =====  For dates: the semantic date type (issued, created, available, etc.)

identifier_type.description: For identifiers: the identifier type (doi, url, etc.)

hub.v1.ComputedField.title: Computed Field
hub.v1.ComputedField.description: ComputedField defines a field derived from multiple source fields. Used for values that require access to the full source message during parsing. Example: ProQuest embargo date is computed from embargo_code + accept_date
